name: sls-rust-minimal
description: Deployment tools for the minimal Serverless Rust application.
author: Christian Kjaer <ckl@codetalk.io>

scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run cdk:deploy
scripts.build: npm run build:clean && rustup target add x86_64-unknown-linux-musl && cargo build --release --target x86_64-unknown-linux-musl -Z unstable-options --out-dir target/cdk/release
scripts.build:clean: rm -r ./target/cdk/release || echo '[build:clean] No existing release found.'
scripts.cdk:synth: cdk synth # emits the synthesized CloudFormation template
scripts.cdk:diff: cdk diff # compare deployed stack with current state
scripts.cdk:bootstrap: cdk bootstrap aws://$(aws sts get-caller-identity | jq -r .Account)/$AWS_REGION
scripts.cdklocal:deploy: npm run --silent cdklocal:clear-cache && AWS_REGION=eu-west-1 cdklocal deploy --require-approval never $npm_package_name
scripts.cdklocal:bootstrap: npm run --silent cdklocal:clear-cache && AWS_REGION=eu-west-1 cdklocal bootstrap aws://000000000000/eu-west-1
